page.title: 08Peoples views of Highworth.
page.content: {What people like. Friendly people, beautiful views,the old pretty buildings,the quiet atmosphere,its situation. {What people dislike. Dogs fouling the pavements,too many building societies,the traffic and lorries, buses coming down the High Street, the hills. {What changes.} More facilties for younger people,more playgrounds and more discos and night clubs,more clothes shops,a roof over the swimming pool. {Facilities used. Most people use the swimming pool and Library.The least used was the bowling club.These facilties were also used by the people squash courts,tennis courts,football clubs and cricket clubs.
